title: Metadata of the demo NFT token for the game Starlit Horizon.
description: Metadata of the demo NFT token for the game Starlit Horizon.

tech.trait.wallet.nft_token_description.nft_token_description: This mystical hourglass is a powerful item, symbolizing the manipulation of time itself. Encased in a dark, ornate frame, its transparent glass reveals shimmering red sand that flows from the top chamber, creating an aura of urgency. The vibrant red rope entwines around its center, hinting at the itemâ€™s ability to bind time in unique ways. Adventurers who wield this hourglass may harness its energies to rewind events, pause critical moments, or gain valuable insights into the future. With its enchanting design and potent abilities, this artifact is essential for those seeking to alter their destiny.
